dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4127083V] Abuse of Ashley Daniels Photos
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Wednesday, May 16, 2007 10:07 PM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4127083V] Abuse of Ashley Daniels Photos ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Abuse of Ashley Daniels Photos Added by system at Wednesday, May 16 2007 03:43 pm X-MailFrom: medinar005@hawaii.rr.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed May 16 15:41:08 2007 Received: (qmail 30749 invoked by alias); 16 May 2007 20:41:08 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 30746 invoked from network); 16 May 2007 20:41:08 -0000 Received: from smtp01.theplanet.com (70.87.6.110) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 16 May 2007 20:41:08 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 16 May 2007 15:41:07 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Wed, 16 May 2007 15:41:07 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from medinar005@hawaii.rr.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HoQJ1-0005fb-Fk for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 16 May 2007 15:41:07 -0500 Received: from ms-smtp-03.socal.rr.com ([66.75.162.135]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from medinar005@hawaii.rr.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HoQIp-0006wN-0U for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 16 May 2007 15:40:55 -0500 Received: from Roy (cpe-66-91-28-152.hawaii.res.rr.com [66.91.28.152]) by ms-smtp-03.socal.rr.com (8.13.6/8.13.6) with SMTP id l4GKenet027225 for ; Wed, 16 May 2007 13:40:52 -0700 (PDT) Message-ID: <000601c797fa$77f17700$2e02a8c0@Roy> From: "Roy" To: Subject: Abuse of Ashley Daniels Photos Date: Wed, 16 May 2007 10:40:39 -1000 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0003_01C797A6.A4FEB630" X-Priority: 3 X-MSMail-Priority: Normal X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2900.3028 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028 X-Virus-Scanned: Symantec AntiVirus Scan Engine Received-SPF: pass (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: domain of hawaii.rr.com designates 66.75.162.135 as permitted sender) client-ip=66.75.162.135; envelope-from=medinar005@hawaii.rr.com; helo=ms-smtp-03.socal.rr.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 16 May 2007 20:41:07.0753 (UTC) FILETIME=[87B19990:01C797FA] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Hello, I am the webmaster of ronisparadise.com (webmaster@ronisparadise.com) and my daughter, who is new to the business, has asked me to help her find a way to stop her photos from being displayed on www.ashleydaniels.org 209.85.22.8 Is this site hosted on your servers? If so, this person is violating copyright laws by displaying Ashley's photos without her consent and we would like the site to be shut down. Ashley's site is www.ashleydaniels.net 81.31.38.21 and as you can see, is the same person being displayed on the illegal .org site. I've included the whois information below as a reference for your decision. If you would like Ashley to also contact you to confirm this, I will have her write you too, but I trust that you will find this sufficient evidence that this individual is indeed in violation of your Terms. I would appreciate your immediate attention to this and look forward to your response. Many thanks for your help. Kind regards, Roy Medina webmaster@ronisparadise.com Whois Info for ashleydaniels.net Roy Medina Roy Medina medinar005@hawaii.rr.com 94-1058 Pupuhi St. Waipahu, HI 96797 US +1.8086760005 (FAX) Whois Info for ashleydaniels.org Moniker Privacy Services Moniker Privacy Services 20 SW 27th Ave. Suite 201 Pompano Beach FL 33069 United States Phone: +1.9549848445 Fax: +1.9549699155 E-mail: ASHLEYDANIELS.ORG@domainservice.com MIME element (text/html)
Hello,
I am the webmaster of ronisparadise.com (webmaster@ronisparadise.com) and my daughter, who is new to the business, has asked me to help her find a way to stop her photos from being displayed on www.ashleydaniels.org   ;209.85.22.8    Is this site hosted on your servers?  If so, this person is violating copyright laws by displaying Ashley's photos without her consent and we would like the site to be shut down.  Ashley's site is www.ashleydaniels.net&nb sp; 81.31.38.21 and as you can see, is the same person being displayed on the illegal .org site.   I've included the whois information below as a reference for your decision.  If you would like Ashley to also contact you to confirm this, I will have her write you too, but I trust that you will find this sufficient evidence that this individual is indeed in violation of your Terms.  I would appreciate your immediate attention to this and look forward to your response.
Many thanks for your help.
 
Kind regards,
